subject: yum problems
body:
Well, unless things have changed since Fedora Core 3 one thing you 
definitely do NOT want to do is to compile and install the latest python. 
That will trash yum for sure!
I did recover from that mistake eventually, but it wasn't fun.

      Jim Wantz
